Overview

Patrodyne Site Skin is a custom skin for the Maven Site Plugin. If you use Maven to build your project then, perhaps, you are using the site plugin to generate a project web site. If not, but you would like to build a web site to describe your project, review the link above then come back here and learn what our custom skin can do for you!

Whether you are using or are planning to use the site plugin, our skin provides additional (and cool) customization options.

Features

  • Configurable via site.xml. More...
  • Custom color scheme and sample palettes. More...
  • Simple settings for font size and family stack. More...
  • Easily include a Flattr button in the banner. More...
